website_summaries.verdict: The Denon Music Maniac AH-D340 headphone pair could be more comfortable, but it offers high quality audio performance commensurate with this price range.
pros: Delivers distortion-free, robust bass response without going overboard
Inline remote and microphone for mobile devices
cons: Can occasionally sound a bit too bright and intense
Headphones do not fold down flat
Not very comfortable over long listening periods

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but a little tight!
customer_reviews.text: I just recently purchased these headphones and was very excited until I put them on. The design is nice and the overall build quality is very good, however the headphones do press down against the top of my head. I have them opened up all the way and they still seem a bit small for my head. It's not a deal breaker and probably will not return them but wish they were a bit larger in that aspect. So far the sound quality is superb, I watched Oblivion on my new ipad air and it sounded awesome! If you see these for $99.99 again don't hesitate you probably won't find a better set of headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Stivo

customer_reviews.title: The most balanced headphone for audiophile under 100$
customer_reviews.text: If you're a fan of audiophile, you must try this. The mid and the high are just perfect. The bass is no rich but it's deep and solid. And you can easily turn the rich bass on by tuning the Equalizer. I bought it for the price of 70$. With this price, this headphone is unbeatable. I've tried the more expensive one Beats Studio (it's now > 200$ on Amazon). I don't think it's better than this one when it comes to audiophile.
customer_reviews.author: Hung

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Absolutely. Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Not much to add to what other positive posters have already said about these amazing headphones; they're really the best you'll find at this price point. They're not collapsible so you'll want to use them exclusively at home- unlike the hinged 'workout' headphones.Those plastic hinges can snap, anyway. These babies are comfortable and sound incredible.Cable is removable-therefore replaceable, if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Richardsson55

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Headphones! Very well balanced sound
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Headphones! Very well balanced sound, great highs, very good mids and bass. Very comfortable for the long listening. No other high class headphones can beat them with such a fantastic price. They can easily compete any 300+ dollar class headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Giorgi

customer_reviews.title: Kind of square around the head.
customer_reviews.text: They're nice but look rather ridiculously large. The shape is also a smidge RECTANGULAR which makes it not hug the head that well.
customer_reviews.author: Pia Nightingale

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and comfortable. Received the headphones a month ago and love how the sound is crisp and clear. Only issue is that I had expected over ear rather than on ear, but they are still very comfortable. I'll look at the specs a bit closer for 50mm vs 40mm next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The combination sounds great together. After reading some reviews about the power ...
customer_reviews.text: I paired my Denon headphones with a FiiO E6 Headphone Amplifier . The combination sounds great together . After reading some reviews about the power output of phones, I ordered the pair together. Awesome move!!!
customer_reviews.author: D-Tezzy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Extremely balanced headphones, bass does not overwhelm other instruments, and u can hear them all very clearly. Very confortable and light. Recommended 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Vitor Toselli

customer_reviews.title: Missing ALL accessories and terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is terrible and was missing ALL accessories in the box. The box also has it marked as $199.99 - so it's definitely not as expensive as it claims on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: F

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived USED pre-opened seals broken inner packaging was hanging outside of packaging scratched and cracked from careless use.
customer_reviews.author: EME IVI

customer_reviews.title: simply the most amazing sound ever
customer_reviews.text: I just got this unit from a local store in Spain. I've to say that I never used such a good headphone. It's quite big but an amazing clear sound. In stores I always test with Anthrax specially The live álbum Music of mass destruction and it's star os a kick in The ass drum set. After that I put Vader with Litany. Wings os in such clear drum kickcks that I had almost no doubt. To finish I tested with blues. Gary Moore and Digiorgio Dark Haul. Simply amazing clear sound. Even in full Power. I simply Love it.
customer_reviews.author: André Luiz Cabral Dutra

customer_reviews.title: awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: are perfect for a music maniac They are comfortable to wear and don't hurt my ears like many over the ear style of headphones do. And the sound is awesome. But what's really neat is that there is a 3-button controller on the cord that will let you control the volume or end and/or answer a phone call if you have them plugged into a phone. That really comes in handy when I'm outside and have my ipod or phone in my pocket I give these 5 stars. They are awesome
customer_reviews.author: I'm hungry. feed me

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for depth of sound and for comfort
customer_reviews.text: My husband (a hardcore gamer and movie watcher) had formerly been using the "Steel Series Flux" gaming headset on his computer. He really loved those...until I got him these. He says these are much better for depth of sound and for comfort; with the Steel Series he had to take them off after a movie and spend a few hours letting his ears rest, but with these he's still comfortable after the movie is done. Recommended! The only drawback was that it didn't have the pink/green plugs for the PC jacks, but he kept the cable from the Steel Series and used it with these. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Delamaine

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: If you are a music maniac, then you need these on ear headphones. These headphones are exactly what they claim to be. They are by far the sleekest, most stylish headphones I have ever seen, the picture does not do them justice. These headphone look awsome, and the sound quality is even better than the looks. The clarity is fantastic and the comfort level on the head and ears is a 10 out of 10. These headphones beat the Beats. If you are looking for great stylish headphones, then these are the headphones you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I used the Denon Urban Raver before and wasn't comfortable they were heavy and don't like the features, but this one the Music maniac are awesome, great sound, and not to heavy, I like the cable with in-line remote and mic for Apple IPod, IPhone and IPad control and communication is very easy to use I recommend this headphones they are pretty too
customer_reviews.author: Liliazuli

product_meta.title: Denon AH-D340 Music Maniac On-Ear Headphones
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingWhen was the last time you really sat and listened to your favorite piece of music? With Denon's line of Music Maniac headphones you'll want to do it again, and again, and again. Some people are just as obsessed about sound quality as we are. And they know sound quality is much more than the size of the driver and the cavity space in the ear cup it's further enhanced by the right cables, the right connectors, the right tuning. At Denon we've sweated the details so you don't have to. Our new AH D340 Music Maniac On Ear headphones feature: 40mm drivers tuned for high performance sound with a flat EQ, Non tangle cable with in line remote and microphone for Apple iPod, iPhone and iPad control and communication, 2 Axis Ear Cup Design provides 360 degree articulation for a custom fit, Patent Pending Pentagonally Shaped Memory Foam Ear Pads and Adjustable Headband provide superior comfort, great fit, and noise isolation. Also Included: Carrying Case with Karabiner. Further enhance your listening experience by downloading the Denon Audio app, available for Apple iPhone, Apple iPad, and Android smartphones.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Denon's Music Maniac On-Ear Headphones provide outstanding sound and acoustical authenticity, whether you're listening at home or on the go. Professionally tuned to a flat EQ, the headphones deliver music as the artist intended. Features include 40-millimeter drivers for high-performance sound, a detachable cable with integrated remote and microphone, pentagonally-shaped memory foam ear pads, and an adjustable headband for lasting comfort.

 40-millimeter drivers deliver music as the artist intended. View larger.

 Denon Audio App available for iOS and Android
(Click to view larger).

 Control volume and take calls with the in-line remote and microphone. View larger.

HEAR MUSIC AS THE ARTIST INTENDED
Music Maniac On-Ear Headphones are acoustically transparent, meaning they deliver sound precisely as the artist intended you to hear it. Featuring 40-millimeter drivers with neodymium magnets, these soft, sculpted headphones provide superior sound quality at home and on the go. 

DETACHABLE CABLE WITH IN-LINE REMOTE AND MICROPHONE
The headphones include a 3-foot detachable cable with an integrated remote and microphone for easy control of your iPod, iPhone, or iPad. The remote lets you adjust the volume, play/pause music, and answer/hang up telephone calls. The microphone is placed slightly higher on the cable than on conventional models to ensure your conversations are crystal clear. 

ERGONOMIC DESIGN FOR LONG LISTENING PERIODS
Denon's pentagonally-shaped memory foam ear pads isolate outside noise and let you listen comfortably for hours at a time. An adjustable headband and two-axis ear cup design with 360-degree articulation provide a customized fit. 

USE EQ PRESETS WITH DENON AUDIO APP
Download the Denon Audio app from the App Store or Google Play Store to further enhance your listening experience. The app lets you instantly create playlists, access Denon EQ presets, and create, save, and share custom equalizer curves. You can also enjoy over 70,000-band Internet radio stations worldwide with TuneIn Internet radio service. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Music Maniac On-Ear Headphones, carrying case with detachable karabiner, and 3-foot audio cable. 

MUSIC MANIAC ON-EAR HEADPHONES
 * Tuned to flat EQ for acoustic transparency
 * 40-millimeter drivers deliver deep, powerful sound
 * Pentagonally-shaped memory foam ear pads and adjustable headband for comfortable fit
 * In-line remote lets you control volume and take calls
 * Denon Audio app enhances the listening experience

 Includes carrying case and 3-foot audio cable.
View larger.
